#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:55:09

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    return min(abs(x - xs[0]), abs(x - xs[-1]))

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-15 09:52:03

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs) # sort xs
    x_min = xs[0] # get the left-most point
    x_max = xs[-1] # get the right-most point
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:55:40

import sys

def solve(n, x, xs):
    if n == 1:
        return abs(xs[0] - x)
    xs = sorted(xs) + [x]
    xs = sorted(xs)
    if xs.index(x) == 0:
        return xs[1] - x
    elif xs.index(x) == n:
        return x - xs[-2]
    else:
        return min(x - xs[xs.index(x)-1], xs[xs.index(x)+1] - x)

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(n, x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]) * 2)
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, dist[i] - dist[i - 1])

print(ans)
N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:54:04

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:56:10

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1] 
    if x <= x_min or x >= x_max:
        return x_max - x_min 
    else:
        return min(x - x_min, x_max - x) 

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**6)
readline = sys.stdin.buffer.readline

N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

A.sort(reverse=True)
ans = [0] * N

def dfs(i, m):
    if m == 0:
        return True
    if i >= N:
        return False
    res = dfs(i + 1, m) or dfs(i + 1, m - A[i])
    if res:
        ans[i] = 1
    return res

if dfs(0, M):
    print('Yes')
    for a in ans:
        print(a)
else:
    print('No')



#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-15 09:54:26

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x - x_min)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x_max - x)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-15 10:02:47


import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min


def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:55:03

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs.items(), key=lambda x: x[1])
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_min or x > x_max:
        return x_max - x_min
    else:
        return min(x - x_min, x_max - x)

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = dict(zip(list(range(1, n + 1)), map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
